featured.text: The pyramid housed the pharaoh’s body together with priceless treasure, which would accompany him into the next world.
A magician named Dedi of Dedsnefu was reported to have performed for the pharaoh, or the king.

definition.zh_def: 法老：古埃及的君主，通常被視為神的化身，擁有至高無上的權力。
definition.en_def: Pharaoh: The title of the ancient Egyptian monarch, often regarded as a god on earth with supreme power.
definition.example: The pharaoh built magnificent pyramids as tombs for himself.
